title: JetLease Capital Arranges $5.0MM Hawker 900XP Loan
text:
JetLease Capital Arranges $5.0MM Hawker 900XP Loan July 29, 2015, 06:50 AM Related: Aircraft , Aviation , Helicopters , JetLease Capital 
JetLease Capital announced the company arranged and closed financing for a Hawker 900XP business jet based in the Midwest United States. The transaction was structured as a 7 year term loan, 15 year amortization, floating interest rate of Libor + 2.25%. The client is a corporation engaged in the real estate industry. JetLease Capital is based at the West Palm Beach Florida Airport and specializes in corporate aircraft financing transactions including term loans, leases, and bridge loan structures for fixed wing aircraft and helicopters.
